full_summary:
# Audio/Visual Equipment Supply and Installation Tender Notice

### Tender Details
* **Tender Title**: Supply and Install Audio Visual Equipment at SSC Fit-up (SSC Fit-up)
* **Reference Number**: WS4552206118-Doc4589473843
* **Publication Date**: May 16, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 17, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

### Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to supply and install audio/visual equipment at 719 Heron Road, with an anticipated completion date of October 1, 2025.

### Key Requirements
* Supply and install audio/visual equipment
* Completion date: October 1, 2025
* Mandatory site visit: June 5, 2024 (refer to RFP for details)

### Notice Information
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19724571
* **Supplier Support**:
	+ Contact: Louie Turner, SPAC/PSPC
	+ Email: louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ 

### Contract Details
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* **Contracting Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information
* Louie Turner
* louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Terms
* The tender is for a single lot.
* The lowest price will be the criterion for selection.
* The contract will be awarded based on the evaluation of proposals. 

Note that the Notice information and Description content have been 100% rewritten, while leaving the details intact. I have added a brief summary to highlight the key elements.
